## Recommendations
- Add testimonials/case studies and logos.
- Optimize images (<2MB, prefer WebP/AVIF).
- Add structured data (Person, Project), OG/Twitter cards.
- Add dark mode toggle (respect prefers-color-scheme).
- Centralize design tokens (colors, fonts) for Next.js.
